alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 25 at 9:44PM ChST until May 26 at 12:45AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tiyan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Asan in the Marianas... Tamuning in the Marianas... Chalan Pago-Ordot in the Marianas... Talofofo in the Marianas... Yona in the Marianas... Santa Rita in the Marianas... Inarajan in the Marianas... Merizo in the Marianas... Ipan Buoy in the Marianas... Andersen AFB in the Marianas... Apra Harbor in the Marianas... Hagatna in the Marianas... Piti in the Marianas... Mongmong-Toto-Maite in the Marianas... Agat in the Marianas... CoCo Island in the Marianas... Hagatna Heights in the Marianas... Dededo in the Marianas... Umatac in the Marianas... Barrigada in the Marianas... Sinajana in the Marianas... Mangilao in the Marianas... Yigo in the Marianas... * Until 1245 AM ChST. * At 944 PM ChST, satellite estimates indicate thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Satellite estimates. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... the entire island of Guam. FLASH FLOOD...SATELLITE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
